title: 16 Instant Pot Ground Beef Dinners
description: Have some extra ground beef on hand you're looking to use up? From stuffed peppers to chili to casserole—we've put together a collection of Instant Pot ground beef recipes that will feed the whole family.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 16 Instant Pot Ground Beef Dinners By Melanie Fincher Melanie Fincher Melanie Fincher is a Birmingham, Alabama–based food writer who covers everything from cooking techniques to gadget reviews. She has nearly 7 years experience writing news and lifestyle content. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on August 20, 2020 Close Credits: bd.weld Have some extra ground beef on hand you're looking to use up? Cooking with ground beef in the Instant Pot is easy. Simply use the sauté function to achieve perfectly browned beef, before adding in the rest of your ingredients. Making these ground beef dinners in your Instant Pot will save you time, money, and dishes (not to mention they're delicious). From stuffed peppers to chili to casserole—we've put together a collection of Instant Pot ground beef recipes that will feed the whole family. 01 of 16 Pressure Cooker Mexican Beef Rice View Recipe Save My Hot Southern Mess This simple recipe will be a hit for both kids and adults alike. The best part? It can be made using ingredients you likely already have on hand. "This was amazing! Even used it for chip dip the next day by adding more cheese," says reviewer Amber Theurer. 19 Best Mexican Recipes for the Instant Pot 02 of 16 Instant Pot Hamburger Soup View Recipe Save France C Recipe creator Angela Giannetti Snyder says, "Easy and delicious soup with a nice thickness. You can make it in the Instant Pot® or on the stovetop. When this cools, it will be very thick, but it thins out when reheated. Freezes very well." Our Top 20 Instant Pot Soup Recipes 03 of 16 Instant Pot Goulash View Recipe Save France C The Instant Pot makes it so that you can have goulash ready in 40 minutes, start to finish! Recipe creator Brook says, "The best goulash recipe I've ever made! And so quick and easy with an Instant Pot®! Top with Parmesan cheese and enjoy." See our entire collection of pasta recipes here. 04 of 16 Instant Pot Lasagna View Recipe Save Shauna James Ahern Yes, you read that right. You can get all the cheesy, crispy goodness of oven-baked lasagna in less time with your Instant Pot. Recipe creator Shauna James Ahern says, "If you have a 6 or 7-inch springform pan and you kept the trivet that came with your Instant Pot®, you can make a delicious layered lasagna pie in 30 minutes. And if you want to make it ahead, you can prep the lasagna, put it in the freezer, then put it right into the Instant Pot® for an easy dinner." More Lasagna Recipes 05 of 16 Instant Pot Quick and Easy Outlaw Chili Beans View Recipe Save bd.weld Reviewer Buckwheat Queen says, "This method is too simple, just brilliant. I used a traditional pressure cooker, 7-quart. I used homemade beans, adding some chili style black beans as well as pintos. I used the amount of liquid as written though to keep it from getting too soupy. The flavor is exceptional and with all the garnishes this turned into a meal-in-one for the whole family." How to Cook with Beans 06 of 16 Instant Pot Sloppy Joes View Recipe Save bd.weld Recipe creator bd.weld says, "A combination of lean ground beef and apple cider vinegar makes this sloppy Joe recipe slightly sweet and slightly tart, made right there in your Instant Pot®. Enjoy!" Dinner is served in just 35 minutes with this sloppy joe. Get more easy recipes for this saucy sandwich, including low-fat turkey and not-so-sloppy versions. 07 of 16 Instant Pot Beef-Stuffed Peppers View Recipe Save bd.weld Sauté the stuffing and cook the peppers all in one pot for these stuffed bell peppers! Reviewer Zepharius Lowell says "I have to say WOW, because this recipe was simple and delicious! I thought I'd choose this as my first ever Instant Pot meal and I'm so glad I did. I feel a lot more comfortable using it after this." 12 Best Stuffed Peppers Recipes 08 of 16 Instant Pot Lasagna Soup View Recipe Save Soup Loving Nicole Recipe creator Bren says, "Ever wondered what to do with that last little bit of marinara sauce or those broken lasagna noodles? Well, I've got you covered! This soup has all of the flavors of lasagna without all of the hours in the kitchen. I've made it with fairly simple ingredients but feel free to add ground fennel seeds or herbs." 09 of 16 Instant Pot Homemade Hamburger Mac View Recipe Save thedailygourmet "A quick and easy dish for a weeknight. While the pressure is building you can make a side salad and have dinner on the table in 45 minutes," says recipe creator Bren. Taco seasoning, garlic, parsley, and chili powder make this a dish that's full of flavor. 10 Great Comfort Food Dinners From Your Instant Pot 10 of 16 Instant Pot Tomato and Beef Sauce View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen Make mealtime easier with this Instant Pot take on classic spaghetti sauce. "Now, isn't this a smart recipe! No more stirring every five minutes. No more splatters to clean up. I used a traditional pressure cooker and after 15 minutes it was thick enough for pasta. I used the exact ingredients and didn't think they needed to be changed at all. The flavor is simple yet wonderful," says reviewer Buckwheat Queen. 11 of 16 Instant Pot Shepherd's Pie with Potatoes and Yams View Recipe Save Jjmcrae Recipe creator Jjmcrae describes this Instant Pot take on shepherd's pie as, "a semi non-traditional shepherd's pie loaded with tons of hidden veggies for those veggie-hating toddlers." 12 of 16 Instant Pot Beef Burritos View Recipe Save Charlene Watson Serve this burrito filling in tortillas to make burritos or simply enjoy as is for an easy, Instant Pot burrito bowl. This dish is loaded with beef, rice, black beans, tomatoes, taco seasoning, cilantro, avocado, and cheese. 13 of 16 Instant Pot® Salisbury Steak with Onion and Mushroom Gravy View Recipe Save KGora "The gravy is absolutely delicious, and that little bit of red wine adds incredible richness and depth of flavor," says home cook lutzflcat. "Some might say, 'Hey, this is just salisbury steak,' but this turned out exceptionally well." Salisbury steak is a classic dinner that is inexpensive and so easy to make. Find the best recipes here! 14 of 16 Instant Pot® Meatloaf View Recipe Save Cybergy Besides, perhaps, an apple, the ingredients in this meatloaf are staples you probably have in your pantry and fridge. More Beef Meatloaf Recipes 15 of 16 Instant Pot® Ground Beef Stroganoff View Recipe Save Here's a quick-and-easy beef stroganoff that's prepped, cooked, and on the table in just 40 minutes. "This is a guaranteed crowd-pleasing meal made in an Instant Pot®!" says peloquinswife. "Homemade, delicious food instantly." 16 of 16 Instant Pot® Basic Cabbage Rolls View Recipe Save Bren "It was delicious! Thank you for sharing! Reminds me of being a kid and my grandmother making stuffed cabbage with it simmering on the stove for hours," Steve Fore says. More Instant Pot® Main Dish Recipes Explore more: Recipes Everyday Cooking Instant Pot¨ Main Dishes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
